anisotime

クラス Raypath

  • java.lang.Object
    • anisotime.Raypath

  • public class Raypath
extends java.lang.Object
    Every depth is written as radius. The raypath is of a given ray parameter p. Cannot compute travel time for structures that have layers with 0 velocity and non zero velocity. Layers must have only non zero velocity or zero velocity.
    導入されたバージョン:
    2014/5/20, 2014/6/24 by a phase name time and delta are computed, 2014/7/10 now diffraction phase is computable but only for the raypath which turning R is near the CMB by permissibleGapForDiff, 2014/7/15 getRouteXY(Phase) installed., 2014/7/16 now can compute hidden rayparameter in which S wave has no turning depth. install checkPValidity(), 2014/7/23 Can draw diffraction path, 2014/7/29 consider eps for all boundaries now., 2014/8/6 Modifies member signatures, 2014/8/28 Fixed bug on compute() computeExtendedDelta(Phase) computeExtendedTraveltime(Phase) installed, 2015/1/20 mantleSDelta() mantleSTau() fixed, 2015/1/27 getRoute(Phase) fixed., 2015/1/28 Raypath(double, double, VelocityStructure, boolean) installed., 2015/4/28 Bug in sTimeAlongCMB(double) fixed., 2015/9/4, 2015/9/12 compute → computeDelta, computeTraveltime
    バージョン:
    0.0.2, 0.1.0, 0.2.0, 0.2.5, 0.3.0, 0.3.1, 0.3.2, 0.3.3, 0.3.4, 0.3.5, 0.3.6, 0.3.7, 0.3.8, 0.3.8.1, 0.3.9
    作成者:
    Kensuke

        sv - if true computes SV, else SH

      • compute

        public void compute()
        Compute travel times and deltas in layers. This method must be done before computeDelta(Phase) or computeTraveltime(Phase).

      • computeExtendedDelta

        public double computeExtendedDelta(Phase phase)
        Computes delta for an input phase. The source for the raypath is assumed to be on the surface. If, for instance, an input phase is a depth phase, then ignore the first upper going part and else if uppergoing part is added.
        パラメータ:
        phase - Seismic Phase
        戻り値:
        delta for phase ± upper going delta

      • computeExtendedTraveltime

        public double computeExtendedTraveltime(Phase phase)
        Computes traveltime for an input phase. The source for the raypath is assumed to be on the surface. If, for instance, an input phase is a depth phase, then ignore the first upper going part and else if uppergoing part is added.
        パラメータ:
        phase - Seismic Phase
        戻り値:
        travel time for phase ± upper going traveltime

      • computeDelta

        public double computeDelta(Phase phase)
        Compute delta for a input Phase
        パラメータ:
        phase - Seismic Phase
        戻り値:
        Epicentral distance[rad] for the phase if the phase does not exist or anything wrong, returns Double.NaN

        パラメータ:
        phase - Seismic Phase
        戻り値:
